bios: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with over two years of experience in web application development. I studied at Profit Training Center, where I gained both theoretical knowledge and practical experience working on real projects. I also improved my skills through Full Learning, which helped me confidently master modern technologies and development practices.
Currently, I work at Ekey Business Automation, where I develop and maintain business applications, and I also collaborate with clients on Upwork as a freelance developer.
I am confident working on both frontend and backend, with a strong stack of technologies including:
Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js, Vuex, React, Redux
Backend: Python, Flask, FastAPI, Django, SQLAlchemy
I’m always open to new opportunities, keep learning, and make sure my projects are practical, efficient, and easy to use.
companies: These companies contributed to my professional journey through training, internships, or work.
